snippet: A new book on Maynard L. Parker looks at his photographs of midcentury homes and the way of life they celebrated.
abstract: Jennifer A Watts, photography curator and editor of book Maynard L Parker: Modern Photography and the American Dream, discusses Parker's legacy; Parker was known for glamorous but intimate mid-century photographs of American homes.
lead_paragraph: A new book on Maynard L. Parker looks at his photographs of midcentury homes and the way of life they celebrated.

headline.seo: A Wide-Angle Lens on the Midcentury American Home
headline.main: A Wide-Angle Lens on the Midcentury American Home
headline.print_headline: A Wide-Angle Lens on the Midcentury American Home
